select.id: select利用者負担割合BY年度と被保険者番号

mapper.sql:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai" AS "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai" WHERE "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."isDeleted" = FALSE AND "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."nendo" = #{年度} AND "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} ORDER BY "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."rirekiNo"
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ON ("rirekiNo") "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."rirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai" AS "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai" WHERE "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."nendo" = #{年度} AND "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} ORDER BY "DbT3113RiyoshaFutanWariai"."rirekiNo" DESC
